If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.

images.caption: Woman's Robe, 18th-19th century. Satin lined with cotton, 59 7/16 x 48 7/16 in. (151 x 123 cm). Brooklyn Museum, Gift of Mrs. George Dupont Pratt, 40.360. Creative Commons-BY (Photo: , CUR.40.360.jpg)
